subpanels.description: Gothograptus kozlowskii KOZŁOWSKA-DAWIDZIUK, 1990: finite rhabdosome with curved apertural spines from sample K2/13. Specimen is magnified 10 times and the scale bar is 1 mm.
Gothograptus kozlowskii KOZŁOWSKA-DAWIDZIUK, 1990: sample K2/11. Specimen is magnified 10 times and the scale bar is 1 mm.
Semigothograptus meganassa (RICKARDS et PALMER, 2002): non-finite rhabdosome with free nema from sample K2/6. Specimen is magnified 10 times and the scale bar is 1 mm.
